xxl.core.math.functions

Class AbstractRealFunctionFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.functions.AbstractFunction<Number,Double>
      • xxl.core.math.functions.AbstractRealFunctionFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Function<Number,Double>, RealFunction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractKernelCDF, AbstractKernelDensityEstimator, CubicBezierSpline, DifferenceKernelEstimator, EmpiricalCDF, LinearCombination

    public abstract class AbstractRealFunctionFunction
extends AbstractFunction<Number,Double>
implements RealFunction
    This class provides a skeletal implementation for classes extending Function and also implementing RealFunction. The invoke method of this class expects Objects of type Number and returns Objects of type Double. 
            public Object invoke( Object value){
                return new Double( eval( ((Number) value).doubleValue() ));
        }

    The abstract eval method of this class models the evaluation of a one-dimensional real-valued function, that returns real values, i.e., a double value is expected and a double value is also returned.
    See Also:
    Function, RealFunction, RealFunctionFunction, FunctionRealFunction, Serialized Form
